subject: p11569042
Findings: The heart is again mild-to-moderately enlarged. The mediastinal and hilar contours appear unremarkable. There is patchy opacity in the right infrahilar region suggestive of minor atelectasis/scarring, but widespread opacities and pleural effusions have resolved. No pneumothorax is demonstrated.
